Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.players.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Describes the state of a Player within a specific Game. Stores his ID, his color, the God Card he is associated with, his Workers, the information about his eventual loss.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String color
    The Player's color.
    private Card godCard
    The God Card associated with this Player.
    private boolean hasLost
    Set to true if the Player has Lost.
    private java.lang.String id
    The Player's nickname.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Worker> workers
    List of the Player's Workers.
